$PKKFF I am finally back. Turns out I was wrong about Peak. This shitshow is nothing but an atm machine for JJ. When they started talking about Reverse Splits in order to get institutional support is when I realized what a bs operation they have going on here. What happened to Nasdaq by April? The only thing we got was more dilution and more warrants. Pinduoduo never even acknowledged Peak. I wouldn't be surprised if the only work they did for Pinduoduo was delivering a pallet of Jujifruits.

The main problem though? JJ and friends OWN cubeler. How the hell can Peak not have a conflict of interest in acquiring Cubeler when it's owned by the CEO of Peak? Is JJ going to haggle for a good deal with himself in front of a mirror? What a disaster. I bailed a few months ago at $2.25 and I'm glad I did. See you all in the Grey-sheets.
$PKKFF why is anyone talking about an RS? Did I miss anything? If it's just conjecture than STFU. My belief is that $peak is in a quiet period and cannot release any news. Once that ends
created_at: whatever pent up news is released it will propel the stock high enough for nasdaq. Therefore no need for an RS. If they have to RS it won't be for a bad reason
